multisite_add_website_choose_domain_titl: Choose how to associate your domain
multisite_add_website_existing_domain_ca: Use a domain name already registered with OVHcloud.
multisite_add_website_external_domain_ca: Use a domain name registered with another provider.
multisite_add_website_order_domain_card_: The domain name will be managed by OVHcloud and automatically associated with your site.
multisite_add_website_configure_domain_d: This name helps you identify your site in your client area. It is only visible to you.
multisite_add_website_configure_domain_a: Your DNS zone will be configured automatically.
Enter the name of the folder that will contain your site's files.
multisite_add_website_advanced_options_i: Choose the country in which you want to geolocate your site's IP address. This option can help with the SEO of your pages in search engines.
multisite_add_website_advanced_options_f: Enable the application firewall to enhance your site's protection against attacks.
multisite_add_website_advanced_options_c: The CDN speeds up the loading of your pages and enhances the security of your site by blocking malicious traffic.
multisite_add_website_advanced_options_d: Automatically creates A and AAAA records in your domain's DNS zone.
You will need to enter the specified records yourself in the DNS zone.
multisite_add_website_domain_management_: To ensure that your domain is correctly linked to your site, please edit its DNS zone in the interface of your current provider with the information below.
Insert a TXT field for the domain {{domain}} with the value
Point the {{field}} field of your domain {{domain}} to
Once the changes are applied, DNS propagation can take up to 48 hours to be fully effective.
multisite_add_website_module_cms_title: Choose the one-click module to install
multisite_add_website_module_cms_text: Easily create your site with a content management system (CMS) already installed on your hosting.
multisite_add_website_module_cms_none_te: No CMS will be installed. You will be able to create your site freely.
multisite_add_website_module_cms_choice_: A simple and popular CMS to easily create your site or blog.
A complete and powerful CMS, ideal for more advanced web projects.
A turnkey e-commerce solution to launch your online store.
A content management system to create custom blogs and e-commerce sites.
multisite_add_website_success: Your site has been successfully added! The association of your domain may take up to 48 hours.
multisite_add_website_error: An error has occurred while adding your site. {{ error }}
multisite_add_website_domain_info: The domain name is your website address

multisite_modal_domain_configuration_cdn: Enable the CDN to speed up the accessibility of your site worldwide.
multisite_modal_domain_configuration_mod: Enable country IP to geolocate the international parts of your site to optimize their SEO.
Enable the firewall to benefit from enhanced protection for your site.
Enable this option to have separate logs for your multisite.
The accepted characters for folders are letters, numbers, and the characters -_./ Furthermore, accessing parent folders using .. is prohibited.
Enable the SSL option to access your site via https
If you wish to change your root folder, you must first remove your Git configuration from the directory to prevent potential issues with change tracking and deployment management.
multisite_cdn_activate_description: The CDN speeds up the loading of your pages and enhances the security of your site by blocking malicious traffic.
multisite_cdn_activate_question: Would you like to activate it now?
multisite_cdn_activate_success: The CDN has been successfully activated
multisite_cdn_activate_error: An error occurred while activating the CDN
multisite_git_association_title: Configure your Git for your {{ path }} directory
multisite_git_association_incorrect_url_: The URL format is not correct.
multisite_git_association_ssh_url_repo_h: Enter the URL of your Git repository ({{ httpsRepo }}), or specify if SSH is enabled ({{ sshRepo }})
multisite_git_association_ssh_key_intern: The generation of your SSH key failed, please try again later or contact support
multisite_git_association_apply_configur: Your last configuration failed. In order to configure Git, you need to reapply your configuration.
multisite_git_association_error_message: Git could not be enabled {{ error }}
multisite_git_association_success_messag: Enabling Git... You can track Git activation status in Ongoing Operations
multisite_git_association_ssh_branches_n: Enter the name of the repository branch you want to replicate ({{ branchesNames }})
multisite_git_association_configure_info: Configure the deployment of your files on your Git repository
Enter your Git repository URL and branch name:
HTTPS for a public repository (e.g.: https://github.com/username/)
SSH for a private repository (e.g.: git@github.com:username/)
The installation directory must be empty;
Before applying the configuration, you need to add your new SSH key to your Git account settings in order to deploy a private repository.
multisite_git_association_webhook_descri: A webhook is a tool that allows Github to send updates to other applications, notifying them of specific events occurring in a Github repository.
multisite_git_association_configure_desc: Your configuration will apply to all domains pointing to your directory.
multisite_git_association_reconfigure_su: You will need to redeploy your branch for the changes to take effect
multisite_git_association_reconfigure_wa: Repository URL cannot be changed. To deploy another repository to this directory, you have to first delete and recreate the git configuration linked to this directory.
multisite_git_association_ssh_key_descri: Below, you will find your web hosting planâ€™s SSH key.
